留言內容: What a nice t-shirt!  The design is gorgeous, and the shirt itself is a little better than I expected.  Many shirt these days are tissue-paper thin, but this one is a bit better than that.  Still not a heavyweight cotton shirt that I actually prefer, but nice enough.  I ordered Medium, and I feel like the size is accurate, but I am hoping for just a little shrinkage after the first wash.  Good weather is right around the corner, and I can't wait to wear this out and about.  Cheers.
